texts.biography: Kali comes from the Human tribe called Ashflame, in Tatalia. She is the founder of the Original Witches, the Chroma Covenant, a faction of witches who have sworn to protect the lands. She is known to resolve the matter in unconventional and sometimes harmful ways. She hails from a bloodline of Fire Witches, possessing a lineage so potent that any subsequent Fire Witch is likely to be her heir.
texts.name: Kali
